text: My mom took me to see Carnal Knowledge and The Wild Bunch and all these kind of movies when I was a kid.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: Movies are not about the weekend that they're released, and in the grand scheme of things, that's probably the most unimportant time of a film's life.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: I'm not a Hollywood basher because enough good movies come out of the Hollywood system every year to justify its existence, without any apologies.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: Movies are my religion and God is my patron. I'm lucky enough to be in the position where I don't make movies to pay for my pool. When I make a movie, I want it to be everything to me like I would die for it.
author: Quentin Tarantino

text: If you just love movies enough, you can make a good one.
author: Quentin Tarantino
